content: the last corner join to the top of the beginning ch2 with a slip_stitch do not end off stitch count 37hdc per side 2hdc ch2 2hdc in each corner note the aurora square was originally designed for the fatw3 cal if you are worki ng the square for this particular cal fatw3 you will need to skip the hidden stitch on round 24 so you have a final stitch count of 42 stitches per side including the corner stitches round 24 slip_stitch into the corner space ch1 this does not count as a st 1sc ch2 1sc in the same space *1sc in each of the next 41sts 1sc ch2 1sc in the corner space * repeat from * to * 3 more times omitting the last corner join to the top of the beginning single_crochet with a slip_stitch fasten_off and secure ends stitch count 41sc per side 1sc ch2 1sc in each corner 26 rou nd 25 note begin the surface slip_stitch away from the corner for a neater finish join around the post of any st in round 23 surface slip_stitch along each st all the way around stitch count 164 surface sl sts 27 th an k you for your support for more visit us on ravelry com/designers/hooked-on-sunshine hookedonsunshine co/youtube com instagram com/hooked_on_sunshine/ facebook com/groups/1370975902929963 hookedonsunshine co you can get assistance in our facebook group with pattern questions for billing or other issues you can email queries to hosteam@hookedonsunshine co as always a special thank you to our test teams keeping you hooked until next time 28
